text: Koro Tainui Wētere (22 June 1935 – 23 June 2018) was a New Zealand politician. He was an MP from 1969 to 1996, representing the Labour Party. He served as Minister of Māori Affairs from 1984 to 1990. He was a member of the Ngāti Maniapoto tribe. Wētere died in Te Kuiti on 23 June 2018, one day after turning 83. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:New Zealand politicians
title: Koro Wētere
